titles.title: A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of digital still image video cameras.
A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of digital still image video cameras.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Directs U.S. Customs and Border Protection to liquidate or reliquidate certain entries of digital still image video cameras.
